snippet: The Knicks will introduce Hornacek as their new coach at a news conference on Friday.
abstract: New York Knicks will introduce Jeff Hornacek as their new head coach in upcoming news conference.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks will introduce Hornacek as their new coach at a news conference on Friday.

headline.main: Jeff Hornacek to Be Introduced as Knicks Coach on Friday
